external_games.name: Sperme d’Éros: Garden of Earthly Delights

name: Sperme d’Éros: Garden of Earthly Delights
summary: This DLC will expand the universe of the original Visual Novel, Gardens of Earthly Delights. We will follow this story from the point of view of the couple Eros and Venus. We will follow their materialistic and carnal desires as they delight in pleasures in our real world.
